import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { GET_ALL, GET_ID } from "../api/apiService"; import { useLocation, Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const cardTextStyle = { maxWidth: "80%", }; const Content = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); const addToCart = (product) => { const existingItemIndex = cart.findIndex((item) => item.id === product.id); if (existingItemIndex !== -1) { // If the product is already in the cart, update quantity const updatedCart = [...cart]; updatedCart[existingItemIndex].quantity += 1; setCart(updatedCart); } else { // If the product is not in the cart, add it setCart((prevCart) => [ ...prevCart, { id: product.id, name: product.name, image: product.image, // Add the image URL here quantity: 1, price: product.price, // Add other product details as needed }, ]); } };; const location = useLocation(); const queryParams = new URLSearchParams(location.search); const productId = queryParams.get("productId"); useEffect(() => { GET_ALL(`products`).then((item) => setProducts(item.data)); GET_ID(`products`, productId).then((item) => setProduct(item.data)); }, [productId]); return (
  1. Home
  2. {product.category && product.category.name}
  3. {product.title}

))}
); }; export default Content;
